writer.name: キクオ・カワサキ Kikuo Kawasaki

director.name: キクオ・カワサキ Kikuo Kawasaki

introduction: The initiation of young Mark (Gavin Brannan) into his first sexual encounter is the objective and focus of this run-of-the-mill teen drama by Kikuo Kawasaki. When Mark goes to visit his cousin Toni (David Siegel) in Austria for the summer, he develops a serious crush on Toni’s pretty stepsister Clair (Susanne Ashley) and at the same time tries to fend off Toni’s efforts to get him set up with prostitutes. As much as he likes Clair, Mark cannot bring himself to start a sexual relationship with her and ultimately goes to Clair’s mother Katherine (Sybil Danning) to vent his feelings. It is that meeting that ultimately sends Mark home more experienced than when he arrived.(机译)年轻的马克（加文·布兰南）开始了他的第一次发生性关系是径流式的磨这个十几岁的话剧喜久雄川崎的目标和重点。当马克去看望他的表弟托尼（大卫·西格尔）在奥地利的夏天，他开发的托尼漂亮的继妹克莱尔（苏珊·阿什利）严重粉碎，并在同一时间试图避开，让他建立了与妓女托尼的努力。尽管他喜欢克莱尔，马不能让自己开始与她发生性关系，并最终进入到克莱尔的母亲凯瑟琳（西比尔丹宁），以发泄自己的感情。这是该会议最终将马家比，当他到达更多的经验。
